title: Can't find my "highlights" folder to watch recordings?
body:
I just got the new client yesterday and discovered that you need to record part of the replays to save them. I've saved two recording from different games and it told me to got to "Documents", "League of Legends", "Highlights" but there is no "highlights" folder in my "League of Legends" folder. 
Any way of finding it or fixing the issue?

replies.body: For clarification here, after you record a sample within a game replay, it will be in documents / league of legends / highlights. To read the files, drag them to your browser.

Replays aren't live for every region yet, and as far as I know, they're only on NA for testing at the moment.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I'm in NA I don't see it either
Never mind found it
